items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: Displays a callout for user attention with optional icon and variant styles.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge with multiple variants.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Displays the path to the current resource using a hierarchy of links.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button with multiple variants and sizes.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: A container for displaying content with header, footer, and action sections.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

items.name: collapsible
items.title: Collapsible
items.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.

items.name: drawer
items.title: Drawer
items.description: A panel that slides out from the edge of the screen with support for multiple directions.

items.name: hover-card
items.title: Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: A text input field with support for various types and validation states.

items.name: media
items.title: Media
items.description: A container for displaying images and videos with loading states and fallback placeholders.

items.name: kbd
items.title: Kbd
items.description: Displays keyboard shortcuts or keys with proper styling.

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: Renders an accessible label associated with form controls.

items.name: menubar
items.title: Menubar
items.description: A visually persistent menu common in desktop applications with nested menus and items.

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Pagination with page navigation, next and previous links.

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from with keyboard navigation support.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Visually or semantically separates content with horizontal or vertical orientation.

items.name: slider
items.title: Slider
items.description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.

items.name: text
items.title: Text
items.description: A skeleton text placeholder component that renders thin animated lines for text content.

items.name: sonner
items.title: Sonner
items.description: An opinionated toast component for React with beautiful animations and icons.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and unchecked states.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: A set of layered sections of content with tab triggers for switching between them.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: A multi-line text input field with auto-resizing support.

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off with multiple variants.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when focused or hovered.

items.name: wireframe
items.title: Wireframe CSS Utilities
items.description: CSS utility classes for wireframe components including patterns, animations, and emphasis levels.

items.name: wireframe-types
items.title: Wireframe Types
items.description: TypeScript type definitions for wireframe components.

items.name: wireframe-utils
items.title: Wireframe Utilities
items.description: Utility functions for wireframe components including responsive class generation and visibility helpers.

items.name: paragraph
items.title: Paragraph
items.description: A composition component that renders multiple Text lines to simulate paragraph content.

items.name: heading
items.title: Heading
items.description: A composition component that renders appropriately sized Text based on heading level (1-6).

items.name: list-group
items.title: ListGroup
items.description: A composition component that renders list items with Text placeholders for wireframe prototyping.

items.name: stack
items.title: Stack
items.description: A layout primitive for arranging wireframe elements with configurable spacing and direction.

items.name: section
items.title: Section
items.description: A composition component with preset variants for common layout patterns (hero, content-two-column, feature-grid).

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: A data table component with wireframe helpers for headers and cells.

items.name: item
items.title: Item
items.description: A flexible item component for lists with wireframe helpers for titles, descriptions, and media.

items.name: context-menu
items.title: Context Menu
items.description: A context menu component with wireframe helpers for menu items and labels.

items.name: file
items.title: Field Components
items.description: Form field components with wireframe helpers for labels and descriptions.

items.name: carousel
items.title: Carousel
items.description: A carousel component with wireframe helper for slide content.

items.name: button-group
items.title: Button Group
items.description: A button group component with wireframe helper for text labels.

items.name: input-group
items.title: Input Group
items.description: An input group component for combining inputs with addons and buttons.

items.name: form
items.title: Form
items.description: Form components built on top of react-hook-form for managing form state.

items.name: sheet
items.title: Sheet
items.description: A slide-out panel component with wireframe helpers for titles and descriptions.

items.name: sidebar
items.title: Sidebar
items.description: A collapsible sidebar component with wireframe helpers for menu items and labels.

items.name: chart
items.title: Chart
items.description: Chart components built on recharts with wireframe placeholder helper.

items.name: empty
items.title: Empty State
items.description: An empty state component with wireframe helpers for titles, descriptions, and media.

items.name: hero-section
items.title: Hero Section
items.description: Landing page hero with badge, heading, CTA buttons, and feature list

items.name: login-form
items.title: Login Form
items.description: Authentication form with email/password inputs and social login options

items.name: register-form
items.title: Register Form
items.description: Multi-step registration with tabs for personal and account information

items.name: contact-form
items.title: Contact Form
items.description: Professional contact form with name, email, subject, and message fields

items.name: dashboard
items.title: Dashboard
items.description: Admin dashboard with stat cards, charts, recent activity, and data table

items.name: pricing
items.title: Pricing
items.description: Three-tier pricing cards with features and highlighted popular plan

items.name: product-grid
items.title: Product Grid
items.description: E-commerce product listing with search, filters, and product cards

items.name: profile-page
items.title: Profile Page
items.description: User profile with avatar, bio, stats, and tabbed content

items.name: settings-page
items.title: Settings Page
items.description: Multi-tab settings interface for profile, account, and notifications
